title: TV2 Titkok Ramónával
overview: TV2 Secrets with Ramóna is an exciting and unique podcast featuring in-depth interviews with famous people. We reveal the aspects and stories that remain hidden from the public eye. The show uncovers the reality behind the people, exploring the challenges, successes, failures, and moments that have shaped their lives. Each episode is an exciting journey behind the fame, helping us better understand and appreciate the individuals who have become part of our lives. Here, the curtain truly falls on everything! It's not just about asking questions; we have real conversations! – Hosted by Ramóna Kiss.
